title: Allow changing the website name (page title) and document where to update it

requirements.text: Update the website/page name shown in the browser tab by changing the HTML document title in `frontend/index.html` to a clearly editable app name string.

quotes: how can i change this website's name?

acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/index.html` contains the updated `<title>...</title>` value (replacing the current "Valentine's Interactive Website").
After rebuilding, the browser tab title shows the updated name.

requirements.text: Add a short developer-facing documentation note explaining exactly where to change the website name in this codebase (including `frontend/index.html`), and if any runtime title-setting is introduced, document that location as well.

quotes: how can i change this website's name?

acceptanceCriteria: A new or updated documentation file in the repository clearly lists the file path(s) and the exact line/element to edit to change the website name.
Instructions are written in English and are unambiguous (a developer can follow them without guessing).

constraints: Do not edit files listed as immutable: `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts`, `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx`, `frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts`, `frontend/src/main.tsx`, `frontend/src/components/ui`.
Keep all user-facing text in English.
nonGoals: Adding new branding assets (logos/favicons) unless explicitly requested.
Changing the roses Yes/No interaction flow or any of its required exact strings.
